questions.onset: When did the chest tightness start?
questions.exertion: Does it occur with activity or at rest?
questions.duration: How long does each episode last?
questions.associated_symptoms: Do you have shortness of breath, sweating, nausea, or jaw/arm discomfort?
questions.cardiac_history: Do you have history of heart disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, or high cholesterol?

triage_rules.expression: 'rest' in str(exertion).lower() and int(severity) >= 6 and ('breath' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'sweat' in str(associated_symptoms).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Chest tightness at rest with cardiac symptoms - Possible ACS - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Chest tightness with cardiac history - Emergency evaluation needed
